summary: This is less skirt and metal plate near legs version of Ancient Nord armor based on Hi-Res textures. For detail view the full description and screenshots.
descriptionHtml:
This mod based on TC1984\'s hi-res textures for Ancient Nord Armor from his mod - [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=106]Armor Improvement[/url] and only for female. For male only hi-res textures. You do not need to download Armor Improvement mod for working because all textures for Nord armor included.


Seeing the screenshots you can view changes of armor: 
- Fixed clipping zone of armor near legs. See screentshot for detail.
- By reducing the length of the skirt and metal plate, I picked up the texture to look realistic. See screentshot for detail.
- Now Ancient Nord armor looks as High resolution version. Сomparison can be seen on screenshots.



INSTALLATION:
- Put \"Data\" folder to your Skyrim directory. Accept the replacement.

UNINSTALLATION:
- Delete \"draugr\" folder from \"...Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\armor\" path. 

RECOMENDATION:
I strongly recommend to use my other mod: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4998]Light Nord Armor[/url]. You can equip light type stand-alone version of Ancient nord armor.



CREDITS: 
Thanks TC1984 for hi-res textures of Ancient Nord armor. 
Bethesda for Skyrim
Adobe for Photoshop CS5.1
Sashka871 (also named as Razah)
author: Sashka871
